title: Rank team LFM serious
body:
I may play in the team or ill coach it looking for serious members to synergise and become a strong team in the making hopefully wanting to make competitive 
please put details if you want to trial:
IGN:
ROLE
availability:
a bit about yourself
prior ranks or experience :)
This team is not going to be in{{champion:67}}

replies.body:
Still looking for players?

Tonkymac
AD Carry, Silver 3 atm.   Play anything and everything but have been bot lane since i started back in season 2.   Probably played over 2000 games as ADC and about half that as support
Availability almost all of the time, let me know specifics but most days im online and looking to play :)
Fun and easy to get along with, been looking for serious teams and players for a long time
Started in bronze, went up to gold and back to bronze more times then i can count.   Currently in S3
sweet ill add you when i get home

IGN: DumpShark
ROLE: Mid or adc pref but can play any
Availability: At uni so available most of the time unless I have study to do etc.
I'm 18 from NZ, I like to play carry roles as much as possible and looking for a good ranked team to play 5's with and also for duo's.
I reached Gold 5 last season and I am currently Gold 4 and climbing quickly (check my lolking score graph http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/330603 )
ill add you when i get home yeah :)
Still have not been added, are you still keen to have me in your team?
sorry man been busy i just added you now :)
yeah bro ill add you when i get home im at school at the moment im guessing you main support haha but this team is serious so if your up for competitive games with fun and laughter :)

bjoon ssonim yon

top mid main currently plat 4 but have been having a break from ranked solo q, looking for serious team to reach high lvls an potentialty vs the pros, been playing since s2 finished gold in s2 silver s3 an gold s4 avaliable every day minus a a few hours each day, might not be playing a whole lot now that msi starting but i added you so gimme a msg if keen to play some normal games an see how we go
play maokai and gnar in the top lane bout it

IGN:Harrietx
ROLE:Top
availability:very flexible
Started at the end of season 2 so been around for a while hoping to find a more serious 5s team
hey man is there any other champs you play besides riven :) i like your riven your good

sweet as keen to play a few games with you :) and yeah im looking to get this team very far as a player/coach ill sub in when we dont have enough people in rank 5
will you be on tonight?

IGN: Hi lm Jeff
ROLE: dragon control
Availability: 5 pm - 11 pm weekday, 12 am - 11pm Weekday
I main teemo cus teemo is almost a permanant ward. As pros say, vision wins games!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Currently in gold 3 but was gold 1 a few weeks ago.{{champion:17}}
i swear i played against you bro xD love the vision game but ill try you out :) but this is serious looking to make this team into high elo to compete with the teams

IGN: Deep Sanity
ROLE: i play any role but no so much supp unless i have to.
availability: mon - thurs 3 - 10 pm fri - sun any time
im 16 almost 17 been playing since s4 but i have improved since.
sweet as ill add you mate
yeah ill be on

IGN: Demonsiayer
Role: Mid lane main
Available most nights
the league on this account is s5  =)
sweet are you available for tonight/today to play :) so i can see your play style

Sure, I will be on tonight =)

Also add me on skype: farouk.darwiche
yeah no problem :)

IGN: Unsoft
ROLE: Sup, jung
availability: At uni so basically any time
a bit about yourself: Age 20, at university/college. Play csgo and League most of my spare time. 
prior ranks or experience: Gold 3 this season, and achieved gold in 5's last season.
sweet want to come play later today ill add you and we will have a few games since i main adc we could duo bot lane :) and do you have skype

IGN: Pup5z
Role: Mid/Adc
Available most nights besides Mon Wed Thurs from 6:30 pm - 10 pm
Started playing league of legends about a year and a half ago first started on dota2 and then got introduced into League last season i started of at Silver 3 but due to work at that time i couldn't play and i got dropped down to B5 yay and yeah couldn't get out of it cause i wasn't able to play so much etc.
ahh i see sure are you able to play today and we will play a few normals :)

"we are making a ranked team, but instead of giving useful details, i'm not going to state anything about the ranked team and just post a load of crap."

Tell people the ranks your looking for.
Ranks dont matter its about how the player plays and how they read the game
